devdoc.author: Wrap That Potassium <wrap-that-potassium@protonmail.com>

returns.swapAmountIn: the input amount which would be swapped
returns.swapAmountOut: the output amount after such a swap
returns.swapTokenOut: the address of the output token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.tokenAmountOutMin: the minimum amount of the other token from the pair expected with the swap

zapInFromToken(address,uint256,uint256).details: this function assumes an approval for `tokenId` was done previously for this contract

params.tokenAmountOutMin: the minimum amount of the other token from the pair expected with the swap
params.tokenIn: the token to zap in from
params.tokenInAmount: the amount of `tokenIn` to create liquidity from

params.tokenAmountOutMin: the minimum amount of the other token from the pair expected with the swap
params.tokenIn: the token to zap in from
params.tokenInAmount: the amount of `tokenIn` to create liquidity from

zapOutToToken(uint256,address,uint256).details: this function assumes an approval for `tokenId` was done previously for this contract

params.desiredToken: the token to zap out to
params.desiredTokenOutMin: the minimum amount of the other token from the pair expected with the swap

params.desiredToken: the token to zap out to
params.desiredTokenOutMin: the minimum amount of the other token from the pair expected with the swap

devdoc.title: Zap in/out contract for wBAN farms

estimateSwap(address,uint256).notice: Estimate a swap from `tokenIn` for amount `fullInvestmentIn`

zapInFromTokenWithPermit(address,uint256.notice: Zap in from token `tokenId`, using permit feature (EIP-2612).

zapOutToTokenWithPermit(uint256,address,.notice: Zap out to token `desiredToken`, using permit feature (EIP-2612) of the LP token.
